text: wadhkru hin hssan alshaytan lilmushrikin ma jawu lah wama hmmu bh, waqal lhm: ln yghlbkm ahd alyawm, fa'iiniy nasrkm, falamaa tqabl alfryqan: almushrikun wamaeahum alshytan, walmslmwn wamaeahum almlaykt, raje alshaytan mudbrana, waqal llmshrkyn: 'iiniy bari' mnkm, 'iiniy 'araa ma la tarawn min almalayikat aladhin jawu mddana llmslmyn, 'iiniy 'akhaf allh, fkhdhlhm wtbra mnhm. wallah shadid aleiqab liman easah walam yatub tawbatan nswhana
